Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Granville
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Granville due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#92 Foster

#151 Sheridan

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
